mentionedBy.name: Asana
mentionedBy.notes: Lightweight collaborative workspace offering free tier with core project management features, appealing to teams seeking simplicity.

mentionedBy.name: Atlassian Corporation
mentionedBy.notes: More than knowledge base - unified workspace bringing team's notes, docs, and projects together in central location. Excels in facilitating collaboration and knowledge sharing within single platform
